clusterList.phrase: congress shall make no law respecting the establishment of religion or prohibiting the free exercise thereof

the senators and representatives shall be bound by oath or affirmation to support this constitution but no religious test shall ever be required as a qualification to any office or public trust under the united states
the u s constitution prohibits a religious test for public office but that is precisely what is being posed now romney is well aware that an unconstitutional religious test is being applied to him
